mapper.insert: insert into T_OMM_CHECKINGPOINT (ID, NAME, POSITION, TUNNEL_ID, CRT_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tunnelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into T_OMM_CHECKINGPOINT
ID,
NAME,
POSITION,
TUNNEL_ID,
CRT_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tunnelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update T_OMM_CHECKINGPOINT
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TUNNEL_ID = #{tunnelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_OMM_CHECKINGPOINT set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TUNNEL_ID = #{tunnelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select c.id,c.name,c.position,c.tunnel_id,t.name as tunnelName,c.crt_time from T_OMM_CHECKINGPOINT c left join T_COMMON_TUNNEL t on c.tunnel_id = t.id where c.id = #{id}
